backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the Valentine's CTA enhancement to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base variables defining color tokens and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentinesSurprise page as the main view.
frontend/src/components/ValentineDelight: Component generating animated floating heart particles with timed cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshing queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles plus animation utilities including heart float and reveal effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wiring QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider around App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinesSurprise.ts: Main Valentine's page with music playback, animated hero, love card, burst animation, and secret message trigger.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state for building a Valentine-themed React page, listing features, architecture notes, and known issues.
